name: mnli_crowdsource
template: {premise} Using only the above description and what you know about the world; is "{hypothesis}" definitely correct? Yes or No?

name: based_on_previous_passage
template: {premise} Based on the previous passage; is it true that "{hypothesis}"? Yes or No?

name: infer
template: Suppose {premise} Can we infer that "{hypothesis}"? Yes or No?

name: follow
template: Given that {premise} Does it follow that {hypothesis} Yes or No?

name: imply
template: {premise} Question: Does this imply that "{hypothesis}"? Yes or No?

name: guaranteed
template: Given {premise} Is it guaranteed true that "{hypothesis}"? Yes or No?

name: justified
template: {premise} Are we justified in saying that "{hypothesis}"? Yes or No?

name: must_be_true
template: Given that {premise} Therefore it must be true that "{hypothesis}"? Yes or No?

name: should_assume
template: Given {premise} Should we assume that "{hypothesis}" is true? Yes or No?
